page.title: 09My Mum's Hobby _ M.Lister
page.content: 1My Mum likes gardening.She plants tomatoes.She says she likes planting Asters because they look so beautiful.The colours are pink,blue and yellow.We have a little wall in the back garden which is full of soil so that we can grow flowers in there.My Mum has some special gardening gloves.They are blue with flowers and have grips which help to hold things better.My Mum puts blue slug pellets around her plants.They kill the slugs so they cannot eat the plants.She puts them around the bottom of the plant so that the slugs eat the pellets and not the plants.
